Paragraph: Constitutional RB1 - gene mutations in patients with isolated unilateral retinoblastoma .

2. RB1 gene mutations: This is the underlying cause or etiology of the disease, Retinoblastoma. The mutation in the RB1 gene leads to the development of the disease.
